lines: We should indeed keep calm in the face of difference, and live our lives in a state of inclusion and wonder at the diversity of humanity.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7020bba08>

lines: We all came in on different ships, but we're all in the same boat now.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702123108>

lines: Strength lies in differences, not in similarities.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702109d20>

lines: I believe that we are here for each other, not against each other.
author: <Author:0x00007fe70215b530>

lines: Every individual matters. Every individual has a role to play. Every individual makes a difference.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702148a20>

lines: Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702199790>

lines: The most basic and powerful way to connect to another person is to listen. Just listen.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702182680>

lines: Deep listening is the kind of listening that can help relieve the suffering of another person.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702169fe0>

lines: I’m a very strong believer in listening and learning from others.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7021c1560>

lines: Listening is where love begins: listening to ourselves and then to our neighbors.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7021aa8d8>

lines: All doors open to courtesy.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7021fb9b8>

lines: Real strength entails being considerate and supportive of people's feelings.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7021e9448>

lines: Life is short but there is always time enough for courtesy.
author: <Author:0x00007fe70223ec90>

lines: The small courtesies sweeten life; the greater, ennoble it.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702227c48>

lines: Take care, be kind, be considerate of other people and other species, and be loving.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7022102f0>

lines: Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone’s soul heal.
author: <Author:0x00007fe70225fc10>

lines: The fastest route to greater happiness is giving and volunteering.
author: <Author:0x00007fe70224cd18>

lines: An essential part of a happy, healthy life is being of service to others.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702297020>

lines: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
author: <Author:0x00007fe70227fe20>

lines: Great opportunities to help others seldom come, but small ones surround us every day.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7022cdb48>

lines: If you see something beautiful in someone, speak it!
author: <Author:0x00007fe7022b7028>

lines: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7022a46d0>

lines: I can't think of any better representation of beauty than someone who is unafraid to be herself.
author: <Author:0x00007fe70150e340>

lines: The sign of a beautiful person is that they always see beauty in others.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7022d7990>

lines: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7023c57f8>

lines: Be good for something while you live and it is in your power.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7023af638>

lines: The unselfish effort to bring cheer to others will be the beginning of a happier life for ourselves.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702408260>

lines: As we work to create light for others, we naturally light our own way.
author: <Author:0x00007fe7023f1a38>

lines: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
author: <Author:0x00007fe70243bf20>

lines: Those who are happiest are those who do the most for others.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702429be0>

lines: Peace begins with a smile.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702412cb0>

lines: Choose love and peace will follow. Choose peace and love will follow.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702460a78>

lines: Peace, like charity, begins at home.
author: <Author:0x00007fe702449b70>
